instruction: You are provided with a text and an associated emotion, along with two rationales for the emotion. On a scale of 1 to 5, score [RATIONALE 1] on its accuracy in terms of how well it explains the associated emotion. Consider [RATIONALE 2] as a reference with an accuracy score of 5. Only output one number without any additional text. If [RATIONALE 1] is not evaluatable, return 0.
